name: Colorizer-bot
description: A discord bot for letting guild members assign themselves pre-made roles for colors (and other purposes) - also comes with some miscellaneous sugar.
author: deventio7

scripts.build-deploy: git pull; npm update --save; npm install; node bot.js > bot.log 2> bot.err &
scripts.deploy: git pull; node bot.js > bot.log 2> bot.err &
